subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Richard Gasquet won his first tennis tournament of the year when he beat Gilles Simon, 6-2, 6-1, in an all-French final at the Thailand Open on Sunday.
snippet: Second-seeded Richard Gasquet won his first tennis tournament of the year when he beat Gilles Simon, 6-2, 6-1, in an all-French final at the Thailand Open on Sunday.
